name: The Last Flower
storyline: The last Flower is a Flower-Defense top-down Horde shooter with roguelike elements. The world has been overtaken by Shrooms - mushrooms monsters who have destroyed all flowers on earth... except for one. The last flower is being guarded by its sole protecter - The Gardener. The Gardener must fight increasingly difficult, infinite waves of Shrooms in order to protect the last flower. The Gardner will gain powerful items that upgrade their abilities and use one of their pesticide guns to gun down every last Shroom.
summary: The Last Flower is a Flower-Defense game with heavy Rogue-like elements. Take on infinite hordes of Shrooms - mushroom monsters hell-bent on destroying the last flower on earth. Take control of the Gardener, the sole protector of the last flower. Collect powerful items and use your pesticide gun to kill every last Shroom.
